userInterface
Class CreateImage

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      userInterface.CreateImage
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.ItemListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class CreateImage
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.ItemListener

Author:
John Bannister

Creates the window to create a new image with a message merged into it and save the new image. Creates an object of type ImageWithoutMessageEnc or ImageWithoutMessageUnEnc, depending on whether encryption is set, and manipulates them to save the new image.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Specified by:

See Also:
ItemListener.itemStateChanged(java.awt.event.ItemEvent)

createNewImage

private void createNewImage()
Create an ImageWithoutMessage object and tell it to process the bitmap and the text file, optionally encrypting. Used by the go button. Enables saveButton. Disables goButton and encryptText check box.

saveImage

private void saveImage()
Save the new image file to a bitmap on the file system. Used by the save button.

pickImage

private void pickImage()
Choose an image file from the file system Uses openSave.open() static method Used by theImageButton Updates theImagePath text value May enable goButton

pickText

private void pickText()
Choose a text file from the file system. Uses openSave.open() static method. Used by theTextButton. Updates theTextPath text value. May enable goButton.

checkGoButton

private void checkGoButton()
Determines if the go button should be enabled. Used by pickImage() and pickText(). Updates goButton enabled status.

reset

private void reset()
resets objects to the initial state

fullReset

public void fullReset()
calls reset() and also resets controls to the initial state Used by cancel button and also by main window
